scripts.forever: sudo forever --minUptime 3000 --spinSleepTime 3000 -a start -c 'nodemon --exitcrash --delay 10' ./bin/www -o .logs/out.log -e ./logs/err.log && sleep 2 && sudo forever list
scripts.foreverDebug: sudo DEBUG=express:* forever --minUptime 3000 --spinSleepTime 3000 -a start -c 'nodemon --exitcrash --delay 10' ./bin/www -o .logs/out.log -e ./logs/err.log && sleep 2 && sudo forever list
scripts.restart: sudo npm run kill && sudo npm run forever
scripts.restart-debug: sudo npm run kill && sudo npm run debug
